title: SoftBank exits Nvidia with $5.8 bn profit as Masayoshi Son doubles down on AI investments
description: SoftBank Group, led by Masayoshi Son, has divested its entire holding in Nvidia for $5.8 billion. The company also announced that its second-quarter net profit more than doubled, as it prepares to accelerate investment in artificial intelligence ventures. The company said it sold 32mn Nvidia shares last month as well as some of its stake in T-Mobile for $9.2 billion.
content:
SoftBank Group Corp. has sold its entire stake in Nvidia Corp., locking in profits of $5.8 billion just as founder Masayoshi Son prepares a fresh wave of investments aimed at building a global ecosystem around artificial intelligence.

title: 5 ways chatbots are quietly taking over your daily life
description: Chatbots are no longer just customer service tools; they've quietly become part of our everyday routines. From answering health queries to helping us shop online, these AI-powered assistants are transforming how we live, work, and communicate. Whether it’s booking tickets, managing finances, or setting reminders, chatbots are streamlining countless daily tasks. As artificial intelligence continues to advance, their presence in our digital ecosystem is growing faster than ever, often without us even realizing it.

title: Microsoft AI chief says you should be afraid of AI, world will get worse if humans lost control of it
description: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman believes that everyone should be afraid of artificial intelligence (AI). Suleyman insists that the world will only get worse if humans lose control of AI in the future.

title: Brits 'trust AI more' than the Government and even their own friends and family
description: A study found 44% of adults believe artificial intelligence will provide them with more truth and facts, compared to 38% who have faith in ministers

title: IIT Gandhinagar launches three new AI-focused PG Diploma programmes
description: IIT Gandhinagar has launched three new six-month postgraduate diploma programmes focused on Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, and Cloud Engineering. The courses aim to equip students with practical, industry-ready skills through intensive, project-based learning and mentorship from IIT faculty and industry experts.
content:
Indian Institute of Technology, Gandhinagar, ranked 18th in the Engineering category by NIRF, has launched three new 6 month Postgraduate Diploma Programmes in association with Futurense Technologies.

description: OpenAI President Greg Brockman said on X that Katti would be “designing and building our compute infrastructure, which will power our (artificial general intelligence) research and scale its applications to benefit everyone.”
